title: Is the “Insert image” still working?
content: I use Safari on OSX 10.6.8. Is the Insert image button under the body box is still working? On my side it's not. Thanks for your answer.
author: sim

comments.content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317205231im_/http:/typophile.com/files/B_4135.jpg)

Works for me. Mozilla latest browser Windows platform.

Perhaps it's the size of the file?

The Insert Image option seems to have a file size measuring method all on its own. A ...number/number... type of deal. I noticed that if the file size is kept under 100/100 or there abouts it works fine for me.

Hope that helps.
I will try this. thanks for your answer.
I wonder if this really work
